WRITING.TITLE: I think Ridley tanked Alien 5 on purpose
WRITING.TEXT: He was never too pleased about not being asked back after aliens, and when the blokamp sequel started getting traction, he decided to suddenly make a new alien movie. Asking neil to postpone his movie, only to shut it down because he wants to do more himself, was kind of a shitty movie imo. And i respect ridley a lot, just dont think he handled it well

WRITING.TITLE: I love alien 3
WRITING.TEXT: Never got the hate for it. I loved aliens too and i did miss seeing newt and hicks, but i thought this is a beautiful, bleak piece of film making that wrapped up ripleys story nicely. The ending is one of my favourite movie scenes ever. Fantastic soundtrack. Love everything about it.
